description: I was inspired by Wolfgang Puck’s iconic goat cheese and beet napoleon to make something similar, but decided on a dish that is much less elaborate If you have time to spare, you could stack the beet slices and goat cheese rather than crumbling the goat cheese over the beets.
title: Beets and Goat Cheese on a Bed of Spinach
title_page: Beets and Goat Cheese on a Bed of Spinach Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
I was inspired by Wolfgang Puck’s iconic goat cheese and beet napoleon to make something similar, but decided on a dish that is much less elaborate. If you have time to spare, you could stack the beet slices and goat cheese rather than crumbling the goat cheese over the beets.
Featured in: A Dynamic Duo: Beets And Beet Greens.
